inclusion.criterion: abdominal obesity (waist circumference > 90 cm, in men and > 80 cm, in women)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: low fasting HDL levels (< 40 mg/dL in men and < 50 mg/dL in women)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: high blood pressure (≥ 130/ ≥ 85 mm Hg or current treatment with antihypertensive medication)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: receiving clozapine for at least 6 months
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: known allergy or contraindicated to metformin (including Creatine>1.4 ng/dl; abnormal liver function test; chronic cardiopulmonary insufficiency)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 32-year-old obese woman who came to the clinic with weight concerns.
